Posts.Content: Anniemomster wrote: I recently had a "6 month wait" lump that I decided to get a 2nd opinion on. I do breastfeed but am weaning... or trying to, though not doing a great job. ANYWAY.... I have a biopsy on the small lump this coming week and on Friday, I began taking antibiotics for something else. I tried to find the lump this morning and it seems to have almost disappeared. Could it have been a solid ball of infection from nursing? Can't find much on internet. Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Is a lump going away with amoxicillin possible? Anniemomster MTwoman
